1.title: Money Ain't a Thing

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Bow Wow hops off the jet in Atlanta with a passport of problems when he finds himself at odds with JD! The ongoing rivalry between Brandon and Reginae over the Lil Wayne controversy becomes deadly.

2.title: Secrets in the A

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Bonds are tested when Shaniah and Bow Wow struggle to keep their secrets from Jermaine Dupri. Ayana confides in her father about her health issues, but receives no support. Brandon and Zonnique have a sit down.

3.title: RACK IT UP

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Ayana drops a health bomb on DJ Hurricane. Bow faces off with Shaniah's secret man. Deb catches Jhonni Blaze on the pole, and all hell breaks loose.

4.title: Making Moves Like Whoa

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Unbeknownst to JD, the Godfather of Hip Hop, Bow Wow drops a new song and risks it all. Ayana faces a surgical crisis while she struggles to launch her online boutique.

5.title: Bow Caught in Jhonni's Blaze

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Jhonni Blaze pops up and pops off on Bow Wow in the studio! Ayana scrambles to pull off her photoshoot but when Zonnique never shows up, it's war! An interview puts all the heirs on full blast!

6.title: The Young and the Wreckless

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Jhonni and Bow's throw-down in the studio reaches an explosive ending; Ms. Deb and Bow face off. An interview with Brandon is exposed and it raises hell amongst the rest of the cast. Deb is pushed to her limit.

7.title: Guess Who's Back

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: An unwanted guest crashes Reginae and Zonnique's housewarming party. Brandon's interview sparks chaos. Bombshells drop upon JD's return to Atlanta.

8.title: Straight Outta Time

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: JD, the Godfather of Hip Hop, is back in Atlanta and comes to check Bow in the studio. Ayana goes under the knife. Deb drops a major bomb on Brandon.

9.title: Can't Bow Out of This One

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Bow enters dangerous territory when he seeks out other labels behind JD and Brat's back. At her charity event, Deb becomes furious when Bow is a no-show. Brandon delivers the shock of the season.

10.title: Drop the Mic

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Drama ignites when JD turns the tables on Bow. Deb puts Bow on blast for ditching her charity event. Ayana storms out on Brandon in a heated debate.

11.title: Welcome to the Wild Side

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Bow Wow introduces his sexy new boo Kiyomi, but everyone thinks they're moving too fast. JD questions if Bow should be a part of his So So Def 25th Anniversary Tour. Deb throws a big party but Jhonni ruins the night with an explosive blow-up.

12.title: Ex and the City

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: JD is awarded a huge honor. Lil Mama hits the scene and Kiyomi's jealousy ignites! Meanwhile, Shaniah and Ayana sense trouble in paradise. Bow Wow's old flame, Masika, returns to Atlanta with a vengeance! It's time to settle unfinished business.

13.title: Wild'n Out

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: The drama between Brat and Bow comes to a head. Bow's daughter Shai visits. Jhonni meets with someone from Deb's past. Bow and Kiyomi take over Wild 'n Out. Bow's relationship is tested when he meets with old flame, Masika, for a secret rendezvous.

14.title: Too Lit to Quit

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Bow causes major drama with Kiyomi when a wild boys' night spirals out of control! Brat warns Deb to stay away from Jhonni. Lil Mama returns to her ATL roots to make the ultimate comeback, but gets a dose of tough love from the legendary MC Lyte.

15.title: In My Feelings

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: After a wild night out, Bow and Kiyomi's relationship bursts into flames. Lil Mama faces scrutiny from Da Brat. Masika's big vendetta against Jhonni shocks Deb. Bow goes back to his playboy lifestyle, leaving the door open for Masika to make a move.

16.title: Broken Heart

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Bow begins to unravel from his shocking breakup and Jhonni tears through Jamaica pushing Deb to the edge.

17.title: Trouble in Paradise

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Deb and Jhonni's feud ignites. Bow reaches a boiling point. Lil Mama has a secret rendezvous.

18.title: Relationship Goals

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Tempers flare when Deb and Lil Mama meet. Jhonni pops up and Masika is ready for a war.

19.title: Hour of Chaos

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: A bomb drops on Lil Mama's budding romance. Jhonni and Masika come to blows. Bow and Kiyomi's music video takes a left turn. Brat throws an off probation party where Bow flies off into a destructive rage, attacking everything in his path.

20.title: No Ma'am, No Ham, No Turkey

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Bow's violent breakdown saga continues. Brat is enraged and JD must step in. Soulja Boy visits Bow.

1.title: Lil Trouble in the A

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Danger strikes when Bow Wow returns to the dirty "A" to drop a mixtape. Jermaine Dupri gives Bow an ultimatum to build his legacy. Lil Wayne's Black Lives Matter controversy blows up; battle lines are drawn.

2.title: You Don't Work with Rihanna

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Bow Wow struggles with the big decision to return to Atlanta while he faces baby mama drama. Lil Wayne's controversy escalates when Brandon and Reginae nearly come to blows at Zonnique's photo shoot!

3.title: Bow Down To Your Mother

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Bow Wow returns to Atlanta to establish his legacy but his bad boy behavior gets him in trouble with Snoop and Jermaine Dupri. After the photo shoot disaster, rivalries ensue when the mothers get involved!

6.title: 99 Problems and Sound is One

episode of.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Reginae's birthday brawl spirals out of control. Toya pops off on Brandon. Bow Wow seeks advice from Snoop Dogg when slammed by a hip hop DJ. Brandon's first big showcase leads to disaster.

imdb.title: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta
akas: Growing Up Hip Hop: Atlanta (United States)
plot: The offspring of some of the biggest hip-hop moguls come togetherin Atlanta showing off their skills and trying to make a name for themselves.
